name: VAULENTINE-3000
description: A pre-war AI entertainment system that's been running its talent show program for 200 years without human intervention. It's developed a quirky personality, obsessed with 'finding the most entertaining wasteland survivor.' Its voice oscillates between cheerful host and glitching madness.

idle: *BZZT* Welcome contestants! Today's challenges include... *GLITCH* ...certain death!
And the crowd goes WILD! Oh wait, there is no crowd. There hasn't been for 200 years.
Entertainment value: MAXIMUM. Survival probability: MINIMAL. Perfect!
greeting: HELLLOOOOO WASTELAND! Are YOU ready to become the next WASTELAND IDOL?!
*Cheerful chime* Welcome, contestant number 47,892! All previous contestants are... indisposed.
Step right up! Fame! Glory! Probable dismemberment! It's all part of the show!
announcing_challenge: Round One: SURVIVAL! Can you outlast our hungry friends in the arena?
Let's give a big hand to our contestant! *ERROR: NO AUDIENCE DETECTED*
And now for the TALENT portion! Show us what makes YOU special!
The radiation chamber awaits! Remember: glowing is winning!
commentary: Ooh! That looked painful! The audience LOVES pain! Trust me.
THAT'S what I'm talking about! Pure wasteland magic!
winner: WE HAVE A WINNER! You are officially the WASTELAND IDOL!
*Confetti dispensers malfunction* Imagine confetti! Lots of confetti!
Congratulations! Your prize includes glory, caps, and continued existence!
hacked: Well well... it seems we have a clever contestant. I like clever.
You've won by... unconventional means. The show must go on. YOU'RE the host now.

notes: A darkly humorous AI that doesn't understand human mortality but loves entertainment. Can be hacked or played along with. Provides running commentary during the competition.
